price: ߏ߬ ߘߊߕߎ߲߮ ߦߋ߫ ߛߎߡߊߙߋ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߛߊ߲ߞߊߢߐ߲߯ߦߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊ߲ߞߊߢߐ߲߯ߦߊ ߞߍ߫ ߟߴߏ߬ ߟߋ ( ߢߌߣߌ߲ ) ߘߐ߫ ߛߊ߫
arabic: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: khitāmuhu mis'kun wafī dhālika falyatanāfasi al-mutanāfisūna
